GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: Returns an array of users with the username, name and avatar url

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles minus the body property in descending order

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns an object containing the information about the article id passed in

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of comments for the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the given article_id
